akn:content.akn:p: (b) The goals of the national highway freight program are—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Establishment of National Highway Freight Network.—
Designation and Redesignation of the Primary Highway Freight System.—

akn:content.akn:p: (i) If the Administrator determines that a State has not met or made significant progress toward meeting the performance targets related to freight movement of the State established under section 150(d) by the date that is 2 years after the date of the establishment of the performance targets, the State shall include in the next report submitted under section 150(e) a description of the actions the State will undertake to achieve the targets, including—
